cleaned_text: Lydia Whyte Dr. Briggs BI 234 Homework 2 July 27, 2022 Autism, Measles, and the MMR Vaccine In this assignment, you will examine data from several articles published in peer reviewed journals regarding suggested side-effects of the MMR (Measles, Mumps, and Rubella) vaccine. Begin by obtaining the article from the journalLancetthat initiated the controversy regarding the vaccine and autism (Wakefield 1998). You will compare data from this study to data in several follow-up studies to try to gain a better understanding of this important issue. Find the paper in the reference section and download it as a pdf file.
